direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a value related to the attribute, but one returns a human-readable name and the other returns the binary data.
Both methods involve simple data retrieval operations with minimal processing.
Both methods handle object comparisons and involve similar null checks and type validations.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the software attribute is a prerequisite for retrieving its name or other related attributes.
Decoding the attribute body is a necessary step before retrieving the name or other attribute details.
The equals method can be used to verify the state of the attribute after retrieving its name.
